episode.title: Monessen v. Southwestern Railway Company v. Morgan

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Byron R. White

turn.speaker: william_h_rehnquist
turn.label: Chief Justice William H. Rehnquist
turn.text: The opinions of the Court in two cases, No. 86-1743, Monessen Southwestern Railway Company against Morgan, No. 87-519, Maynard versus Cartwright will be announced by Justice White.

turn.speaker: byron_r_white
turn.label: Justice Byron R. White
turn.text: In Monessen, we reversed a judgment of the Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
The opinion we have filed gives our reasons.
Justice Blackmun has filed an opinion concurring in part and dissenting in part, he is joined by Justice Marshall.
Justice O'Connor has also filed an opinion concurring in part and dissenting in part and she is joined by the Chief Justice.
